name: A liquor store too far: Great alcoholic adventure of regular ordinary normal guy
name_original: A liquor store too far: Great alcoholic adventure of regular ordinary normal guy
description:
Psychedelic adventure of an regular ordinary normal guy.

Team: room 120

Wojtek Sypko - programming, game design

Mariusz Osowski - programming, game design

Jagoda Soszyńska - graphic, game design

Wiktor Paluch - graphic, sounds, game design

Błażej Zbrzeźniak - music, sounds, game design

The game is about known and unknown monsters. Play with O and P keys. O key is for KNOWN button, P key is for UNKNOWN button. Active monster is pointed by moving arrow. Press UNKNOWN, if you haven't seen active monster before, and press KNOWN, if you have seen this one before. Collect coins for a beer (you can have one mistake between shops).  Not enough coins - no beer and game restarts.
